info.name: Restful Booker Test
info.description:
This collection demonstrates different ways to perform CRUD web API testing. It uses different test validations with different request and response formats (i.e., JSON, XML, and form URL encoded data).

The web service API used is Restfulbooker API which can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html).

exec: pm.test("#TEST: Ping Request: Status code is 201", function () {
pm.test("#TEST: Ping Request: Body is correct", function () {

request.description: Sends a ping request to the Restfulbooker API to determine if the service is up. The API documentation can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html#api-Ping-Ping).

exec: pm.test("#TEST: Auth Request: Status code is 200", function () {
pm.test("#TEST: Auth Request: Body is correct", function () {

request.description:
Sends an authentication request to create a new auth token. The token can be saved and later used for the PUT and DELETE /booking requests.

The API documentation can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html#api-Auth-CreateToken).
